spells.name: Create Demiplane, Greater
spells.description: As create demiplane, but larger and with more planar traits.

spells.name: Cursed Earth
spells.description: Plants die, living creatures catch diseases, or dead creatures rise as zombies.

spells.name: Overwhelming Presence
spells.description: Creatures bow before you as if you were divine.

spells.name: Polar Midnight
spells.description: Cold darkness paralyzes and deals damage.

spells.name: Wooden Phalanx
spells.description: Creates 1d4+2 temporary wood golems to fight for you.
